settings.heading: Our story
settings.text:
Welcome to Swiss Time Co, where precision meets passion. Founded in 2025 by watch enthusiast XXXXXXX, we are a modern e-commerce company dedicated to bringing you the finest timepieces at unbeatable prices. Our mission is simple: to provide exceptional service and quality, leveraging smart working methods to ensure you get the best deals without compromising on luxury.

At Swiss Time Co, we believe that every watch tells a story — and we're here to help you find the perfect timepiece that matches yours. Whether you're an avid collector or a first-time buyer, we're committed to delivering the finest watches straight to your door with efficiency, care, and affordability.

There are timepieces for everyone, and we want to deliver them to you — always on time, always with quality. Thank you for choosing Swiss Time Co.

settings.rich_text:
We prioritize customer service

Swiss Time Co understand the high expectations of watch enthusiasts and are committed to delivering exceptional service in every interaction and through service

Explore our huge selection online

Featuring exclusively sourced timepieces from around the world, Swiss Time Co offers unique models, both discontinued and new Authorized watches

Most competitive prices

We proudly offer some of Switzerland’s most competitive luxury watch prices, combining trusted partnerships with a commitment to value, quality, and service

Welcome to swisstimeco.ch, operated by XXXXXXX, located at XXXXXXX, XXX XXX, Switzerland (referred to as "we", "us", or "XXXXXX").

These Terms & Conditions outline the legal framework for all purchases, sales, and services offered through our website. By using our site or placing an order—whether buying from us or selling/trading in your timepiece—you agree to be bound by the following terms.

We are committed to transparency and integrity, and these Terms are designed to provide clarity and protection for both you and us. If you have any questions or need clarification, don’t hesitate to contact us—we’re here to help.

Please note: We may update these Terms at any time without prior notice. Make sure to review them each time you use our services or place an order, as the version in force at that time will apply.

A. Accessing the Website

1. Use of the Site

By accessing or using our website, you confirm that you’re of legal age in your country or region, and if you're acting on behalf of a company or organization, that you have authority to do so.

You’re responsible for all equipment, software, and any fees associated with accessing the site.

2. Intellectual Property

All content on this website—text, images, design, and functionality—is the exclusive property of Montauk or its partners. You are granted a limited, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the site for personal purposes only. No content may be copied, altered, or reused without our prior written permission.

3. Prohibited Use

Any unauthorized use—including accessing source code, altering content, distributing viruses, or misusing data—is strictly forbidden. We reserve the right to restrict access to our site or services for anyone in violation of these terms.

4. Modifications & Availability

We may modify or suspend our website or services at any time without explanation or liability.

5. No Guarantees

The website and its content are provided “as is” and “as available.” We do not guarantee that it will be uninterrupted, error-free, or that the content will always be accurate or current. You use the site at your own risk.

B. Purchasing Products

6. Product Information & Pricing

We aim to describe our products accurately, but images are for illustrative purposes only. Prices are listed in Swiss francs (CHF) and include Swiss VAT unless otherwise noted. Foreign exchange rates may apply for international clients and may affect refunds.

Product availability is subject to change, and prices may be updated at any time.

7. Payments

Payments must be made in CHF using the methods listed on the website. For products over CHF 3,000, financing options may be available through our third-party partners, with separate agreements and conditions.

8. Placing an Order

To place an order, you’ll need to provide accurate billing and shipping details. Once payment is made, you’ll receive an order confirmation. If an item is no longer available or there are issues with your order, we will notify you promptly.

9. Delivery & Inspection

Products will be delivered to the address provided. Delivery times are estimates and may vary. Upon receipt, inspect your product immediately. Any issues must be reported within 10 calendar days of delivery.

10. Returns & Exchanges

Unless stated otherwise, you may return products within 10 days of delivery, provided they are in original, unworn condition. Special orders or personalized items are excluded. Return shipping is at your expense unless the item was misrepresented.

11. Warranty

New watches are covered by the manufacturer’s warranty. Pre-owned watches are guaranteed for one year if the original warranty has expired. Damage due to misuse or wear is not covered.

C. Selling or Trading In Your Watch

12. Valuation & Process

Our purchase or trade-in offers are provisional and subject to inspection. All watches are verified via The Watch Register. If flagged as lost or stolen, we are obligated to retain the watch and notify authorities.

Valuations may change if your watch’s condition or specifications differ from those described.

13. Payment

Payments are made in CHF to the account details you provide. You’re responsible for ensuring those details are accurate. If issues arise regarding the watch’s authenticity or ownership, we may rescind the transaction and require repayment.

14. Shipping Your Watch

You can choose to send your watch yourself or request a free pickup (within Switzerland). Items must be securely packaged. For inaccurate descriptions, return costs may be charged to you. Duties and taxes for international shipments are your responsibility.

15–17. Condition, Authenticity, and Your Responsibility

You confirm that your watch is genuine, fully owned by you, and free of any legal claims. You are liable for any misrepresentation or omissions. If your watch does not meet our requirements, we reserve the right to cancel the agreement and seek compensation.

D. General Provisions

19. Data Protection

Our Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal information. Please read it carefully—it forms part of these Terms.

20. Liability

We are not liable for indirect damages or losses unless legally required. Our liability, where applicable, is capped at the value of the product or service provided.

21. Indemnity

You agree to indemnify Montauk against any losses or claims arising from your breach of these Terms.

22. Other Legal Notes

23. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by Swiss law. Any disputes will be handled exclusively by the courts in Zug, Switzerland, unless otherwise required by law.

24. Contact

For questions or support, you can reach us at info@swisstimeco.ch.
